mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PREDICT_STOCK_TRIALS (ID, USER_ANSWER, PREDICT_GAME_ID, UUID) VALUES (STOCK_TRIAL_ID_SEQ.nextval, #{userAnswer}, #{gameId}, #{uuid})

INSERT INTO PREDICT_STOCK_LOG (ID, IS_COR) SELECT t.ID AS TRIAL_ID, CASE WHEN s.TODAY_CLOSE >= s.PREV_CLOSE AND t.USER_ANSWER = 'O' THEN 1 WHEN s.TODAY_CLOSE < s.PREV_CLOSE AND t.USER_ANSWER = 'X' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS IS_COR FROM PREDICT_STOCK_TRIALS t LEFT JOIN PREDICT_STOCK s ON t.PREDICT_GAME_ID = s.PREDICT_GAME_ID WHERE TRUNC(t.CREATED_AT) = TRUNC(SYSDATE - 1)
mapper.select: SELECT ID AS id, USER_ANSWER AS userAnswer, PREDICT_GAME_ID AS gameId, UUID AS uuid FROM PREDICT_STOCK_TRIALS WHERE UUID = #{uuid}
